subject: Robberies and Thefts
Football
lead_paragraph: Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Mike Vrabel was arrested and charged with theft on a riverboat casino in Florence, Ind., the Switzerland County sheriff’s office said. He was released on $600 bond.
snippet: Kansas City Chiefs linebacker Mike Vrabel was arrested and charged with theft on a riverboat casino in Florence, Ind., the Switzerland County sheriff’s office said. He was released on $600 bond.
